Mod description, visibile in content manager.

English: If this is enabled, trees won't be automatically hidden by networks or buildings in the same place.
If this is enabled, new trees will snap to buildings when added.
If this is enabled, adding or removing trees won't affect the map's forestry resource coverage.
Update tree elevation on terrain change
If this is selected, tree elevations will be changed to match terrain height when and where a terrain change takes place
If this is selected, trees will be raised to ground level if terrain levels are raised above them

Tree LOD detail option - low resolution (game default).
Tree LOD detail option - absolute maximum resolution, but only looks a little bit better than ultra.

English: Lock forestry is on by default
If this is selected, the lock forestry option will be automatically enabled each time the game is started.
If this is selected, any data left in the savefile by the Tree Anarchy mod will be ignored. Enable this if you're having issues loading games saved with the Tree Anarchy mod.
This is the default tree limit that will be used for new and loaded games. Games saved with tree limits greater than this will be loaded with the saved limit instead.
